review: Works great as a streaming device. I had some difficulty getting it to connect to my 5ghz band wifi stream, but with a little work and manipulation of that particular band, it was able to connect. Video and audio quality is great, though there are some slight stutters in the playback from time to time. Overall, a great little device.
author: Stuart N.

review: For a device " from Amazon so powerful it could entertain humanity for an eternity”, this has been a large disappointment.If and when it works its just Ok..I will be moving this to my second dust covered TV and either try Roku or Chromecast.Its always losing connection to my wireless ( in range within less than 3 feet of device). Netflix and Hulu are always locking the device so that I have to unplug and reset it. The screen flickers and sound pops when it changes from SD to HD quality. My remote is  possessed, sometimes after clicking the navigation ring it will just auto scroll in the direction pressed requiring another hard reset.Where is VUDU, and Disney Movies Anywhere?? Or at least let me link  my content to my Amazon account.
author: GreyGhost

review: Very Cool!  My kids love the video games.  I love the interface.  Amazon hit a home run with this one.  I can now watch Espn and Disney channel (need someone with a participating cable provider to activate).  Netflix and Amazon interface is the best I have used so far.Only downloaded a couple games but 4,5,8, 16 and Dad all love playing and taking turns.Be sure to go into settings and activate parental controls to prevent in app purchases.  Thankfully amazon sent an email and the damage was limited to 3.99.
